news.n_title: Playing national anthem not mandatory in cinema halls, Supreme Court modifies own order
news.n_description: It is not mandatory to play the national anthem before the screening of a movie at cinema halls, the Supreme Court said today, recalling its own November 2016 order.

news.n_title: MS Dhoni to Anil Kumble: The who's who of cricket world attend Virat Kohli's wedding reception
news.n_description: Yuvraj Singh and Harbhajan Singh were in a jovial mood, former coach Anil Kumble was also in attendance with his wife. Sunil Gavaskar, Sachin Tendulkar, Sourav Ganguly and MS Dhoni also graced the occasion.

n_photo.p_desc_withouthtml: Individuals from the Indian Test team which will depart for South Africa on Wednesday led by Virat, came over in groups. While likes of Umesh Yadav, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Rohit Sharma, Parthiv Patel, Wriddhiman Saha all came in with their wives, the bachelor gang from Jasprit Bumrah, Yuzvendra Chahal, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav to Shreyas Iyer too registered their presence.
n_photo.p_desc_withhtml: Individuals from the Indian Test team which will depart for South Africa on Wednesday led by Virat, came over in groups. While likes of Umesh Yadav, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Rohit Sharma, Parthiv Patel, Wriddhiman Saha all came in with their wives, the bachelor gang from Jasprit Bumrah, Yuzvendra Chahal, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav to Shreyas Iyer too registered their presence.

n_photo.p_desc_withouthtml: But the surprise of the day was former coach Anil Kumble who attended the glittering event in Mumbai with his wife. After the controversial and bitter end to the Virat-Kumble captain-coach relationship earlier this year, not everyone would have expected Kumble to attend the reception.
n_photo.p_desc_withhtml: But the surprise of the day was former coach Anil Kumble who attended the glittering event in Mumbai with his wife. After the controversial and bitter end to the Virat-Kumble captain-coach relationship earlier this year, not everyone would have expected Kumble to attend the reception.

n_photo.p_desc_withouthtml: Interestingly when Kumble arrived most of the members of the Indian team were also inside. Kumble made a quick exit in 15 minutes, suggesting the strained relationship between the duo may not have healed completely.
n_photo.p_desc_withhtml: Interestingly when Kumble arrived most of the members of the Indian team were also inside. Kumble made a quick exit in 15 minutes, suggesting the strained relationship between the duo may not have healed completely.

n_photo.p_desc_withouthtml: Individuals from the Indian Test team which will depart for South Africa on Wednesday led by Virat, came over in groups. While likes of Umesh Yadav, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Rohit Sharma, Parthiv Patel, Wriddhiman Saha all came in with their wives, the bachelor gang from Jasprit Bumrah, Yuzvendra Chahal, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav to Shreyas Iyer too registered their presence.
n_photo.p_desc_withhtml: Individuals from the Indian Test team which will depart for South Africa on Wednesday led by Virat, came over in groups. While likes of Umesh Yadav, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Rohit Sharma, Parthiv Patel, Wriddhiman Saha all came in with their wives, the bachelor gang from Jasprit Bumrah, Yuzvendra Chahal, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav to Shreyas Iyer too registered their presence.

n_photo.p_desc_withouthtml: But Virat inviting the legend and Kumble reciprocating are positive signs after their relationship having reached a nadir, culminating into Kumble's exit as coach.
n_photo.p_desc_withhtml: But Virat inviting the legend and Kumble reciprocating are positive signs after their relationship having reached a nadir, culminating into Kumble's exit as coach.
